title: Plant Medicine for the People, VT 2023
description: Plant Medicine for the People, VT 2023 Hosted By Z Botanicals a Womans Herbal Collective. Event starts on Saturday, 23 September 2023 and happening at 328 Quechee Rd, Hartland, VT. Register or Buy Tickets, Price information.
cleaned_text: Sat Sep 23 2023 at 09:00 am to 05:00 pm (GMT-04:00) 328 Quechee Rd, 328 Quechee Road, Hartland, United States Plant Medicine for the People, VT 2023 Join us for an incredible day of exploring the healing power of plants at the Plant Medicine for the People, VT 2023 event! This in-person gathering will take place on Saturday, September 23, 2023 at 328 Quechee Road, Hartland, VT 05048. Discover the wonders of nature as we delve into the world of plant medicine. Our expert speakers will share their knowledge and experiences, offering insights into the therapeutic properties of various plants. From traditional remedies to modern applications, this event promises to be an enlightening and transformative experience. Throughout the day, you'll have the opportunity to engage in interactive workshops, hands-on demonstrations, and informative discussions. Learn how to harness the power of plants to enhance your well-being, improve your health, and promote a balanced lifestyle. Connect with like-minded individuals who share a passion for plant medicine and holistic healing. Exchange ideas, build connections, and expand your network within this vibrant community. Whether you're a seasoned herbalist or just beginning your journey, this event is open to everyone interested in the healing potential of plants. Don't miss out on this unique opportunity to deepen your understanding of plant medicine and its benefits. Mark your calendars for Plant Medicine for the People, VT 2023 and get ready to embark on a transformative journey of healing and discovery. We can't wait to welcome you! Also check out other [Workshops in Hartland](https://allevents.in/hartland-vt/workshops?ref=ep_desc_also), [Music Events in Hartland](https://allevents.in/hartland-vt/music?ref=ep_desc_also), [Health & Wellness Events in Hartland](https://allevents.in/hartland-vt/health-wellness?ref=ep_desc_also).
